title: Intellectual Disability Awareness Education via Indirect Simulation: A Collaborative Learning-Based Project

context.prior_knowledge: No foundational knowledge in special education or understanding of disabilities
context.additional_context: Focused on current practitioners understanding the learning needs of students with intellectual disabilities in science and designing inclusive educational environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three daily learning difficulties of students with intellectual disabilities through indirect simulation activities.
Learners can propose and apply at least two support strategies for students with intellectual disabilities through collaborative learning tasks.
Learners can apply at least one Universal Design for Learning (UDL) principle for understanding intellectual disabilities to science lessons based on project outcomes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
